name: Slack Night Mode (Black)
description: The most extensive dark and easy-on-the-eyes night theme for Slack. A black variant.
additional_info: CC0. Created by Jonathan la Cour. Variants: https://github.com/laCour/slack-night-mode#themes Issues: https://github.com/laCour/slack-night-mode/issues Changelog: https://github.com/laCour/slack-night-mode/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md
